text.div:
Current Reason for Entitlement Code

Current reason for Medicare entitlement. Source: https://bluebutton.cms.gov/resources/variables/crec

This code system https://bluebutton.cms.gov/assets/ig/CodeSystem-crec defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
0 Old age and survivor's insurance (OASI)Old age and survivor's insurance (OASI)
1 Disability insurance benefits (DIB)Disability insurance benefits (DIB)
2 End-stage renal disease (ESRD)End-stage renal disease (ESRD)
3 Both DIB and ESRDBoth DIB and ESRD

name: Current Reason for Entitlement Code
title: Current Reason for Entitlement Code
description: Current reason for Medicare entitlement. Source: https://bluebutton.cms.gov/resources/variables/crec
